settings.text: Build your own ice cream package for no contact home delivery. Delivered frozen in a box with dry ice. Now shipping in Atlanta
settings.texttwo: Learn about how we started selling ice cream in Turkey, and we then move our business to Atlanta, GA.

settings.question: How and where is this ice cream made?
settings.answer: We developed an oat cream that we churn into a delicious frozen dessert. We make sure to use 100% of the whole grain Canadian oat! We source many of our ingredients and inclusions from local business partners.  Our manufacturing is located at 216 Purdy Rd., Colborne, ON K0K1S0

settings.question: What is the whole deal with the oats?
settings.answer: Oats are our favourite grain for many reasons. Firstly, oats are a sustainable Canadian crop. Research on oats has begun to explore the heart health benefits of eating oats daily. The farms we partner with grow oats in different parts of Canada (Yes they are Gluten Free Certified and pesticide free)! Most importantly, by using oats we are able to recreate the textural and taste qualities of ice cream without the dairy.

settings.question: Why do you create plant based ice cream that is meat to replicate diary?
settings.answer: We believe the best way to reach people who want to reduce their consumuption of dairy is by giving them what they love - an ice cream alternative that tastes like the real thing.

settings.question: How do you make products that look, taste, scoop and melt like ice cream without dairy?
settings.answer: We've spent years developing an ice cream alternative that tastes like the real thing. We found through a unique process we could use oats in replacement of dairy

settings.question: Do you have a storefront or scoop shop?
settings.answer: No, we donâ€™t! We are always growing our list of shops carrying Oat & Mill, including grocery stores, restaurants, and cafes! We're also selling online in select regions of Canada.
